    DTO for full-featured check spec.

    • Method Detail

      • getImpl

        public String getImpl()
        The direct classpath lookup name for a particular check. If not provided, indicates that a check should be looked up by name from a catalog on the classpath.
        Returns:
        className or script resource name of a PackageCheck or PackageCheckFactory.

      • setImpl

        public void setImpl(String impl)

      • getName

        public String getName()
        The display name for the check. If "impl" is provided, and represents a script package check or a class that implements PackageCheckFactory this is treated as an alias for the check during this execution.

        If "impl" is not provided, this is used to lookup a catalog check.

        If "impl" is not a PackageCheckFactory, this value is ignored.

        Returns:
        the checkName

      • setName

        public void setName(String name)

      • isSkip

        public boolean isSkip()
        Whether to skip this check during a scan. Only useful to set in a parameterized context or as an override for a checklist spec.
        Returns:
        skip

      • setSkip

        public void setSkip(boolean skip)

      • notSkipped

        public boolean notSkipped()

      • getConfig

        public org.json.JSONObject getConfig()
        If impl references a script check or a PackageCheckFactory, or if the check loaded from a catalog by name is a script check or a PackageCheckFactory, this is used to configure the check.
        Returns:
        the JSONObject configuration for the package check

      • setConfig

        public void setConfig(org.json.JSONObject config)

      • overrides

        public boolean overrides(CheckSpec other)

      • isOverriddenBy

        public boolean isOverriddenBy(CheckSpec other)

      • overlay

        public CheckSpec overlay(CheckSpec other)
